value.name: Care center worker arraigned on assault charges
value.description: An employee at LaurelWood Care Center in Upper Yoder Township was arraigned on Wednesday, accused of assaulting a co-worker who later left the job, authorities said.

value.name: New Testimonials by Occupy LA Detainees Suggest Illegal Arrests, Abuse, Even Torture by LAPD, LASD
value.description: Many of the individuals who were swept up by last week's LAPD raid on the Occupy LA encampment at Los Angeles City Hall were arrested even as they attempted to disperse in accordance with police directives, according to testimonials from some who were ...

value.name: Federal Judge in Don Siegelman Case Arrested, Charged with Abusing Wife in Atlanta Hotel
value.description: Fuller, 55, is a judge in the Middle District of Alabama and presided over the 2006 bribery trial of former Alabama Gov. Don Siegelman and HealthSouth CEO Richard Scrushy. Police responded to the Ritz-Carlton Hotel at 181 Peachtree Street at 10:47 p.m ...
